data.description: Parse or create Rich Site Summaries (RSS)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
brian d foy writes: Jonathan has agreed to transfer this module to
    me so I can clear the existing tickets in RT. I'm registering the
    module before I transfer it.

    Rael Dornfest (another XML::RSS author) suggested a total rewrite,
    but I'll worry about that later.

    If someone else wants to maintain the module, I would be glad to
    transfer it to them.

    Since we've been rejecting requests to put things into XML::*, I
    don't mind changing the name of this module. Right now my goal is to
    fix it for those people already using it.
